nodes.text: Meltdown is a mini five-part roleplaying game adventure that appears in Instant Adventures, published by West End Games in December 1996.

The Rebel outpost has experienced a technical breakdown - the operatives there have a short window to find new parts for the reactor before everything fails. They must go to an Imperial re-supply base and attack or infiltrate the station to get what they need. When they return, they find the base in the middle of an attack.
